english.segment1: And I'm amazed by You. Cause You're never far away. And all that I've been through, Your love has never changed
english.segment2: Chorus: You make oceans from the rain. Breathing life into this place. And I will drown inside your love. Until I see your perfect face
english.segment3: And nothing I've acquired means anything at all. Cause you're everything I needed. You're so much more than I deserve
english.segment5: And I thank you Lord (repeat 4 times)
english.segment7: The blood of Jesus can wash your pain away
